title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: Upon creating a new project, there is no confirmation or indication that the bin directory can be scrubbed for unnecessary files.
EB: When creating a new project, there should be a confirmation or notification explicitly stating that the bin directory can be scrubbed to remove unnecessary files.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the 'Create New Project' section.
2. Fill in the required project details and proceed with the project creation.
3. Observe the confirmation or notification regarding the ability to scrub the bin directory for unnecessary files.
